item.title: Adding 3rd Party Code To Your Project
item.description: Summary This talk covers two ways of adding dependencies to an Xcode project; using Git Submodules or with CocoaPoads. Slides These are available on SpeakerDeck Video The video can be seen at SkillsMatter
